title: Blank Cards
text: Cards that are blank card backs represent any card in their game that you can name. You cannot name a card thats already been played this game.

title: Land Types
text: Cards not on the battlefield can be Land or non-Land, determined by the owner of the effect that cares about it. Cards played face down as Lands are Lands of all types.

title: Yugioh Summoning
text: Level 4 or lower monsters can be summoned to the battlefield for free.

title: Pokemon Casting
text: Pokemon cards cost no resources to play.

title: Pokemon Abilities
text: Pokemon abilities can be activated with mana. Your turn is ended after you use a pokemon ability.

title: Pokemon Bench
text: Your hand counts as your bench.

title: Pokemon Damage
text: Damage dealt to Pokemon stays on them while they remain on the battlefield.

title: Lorecana Damage
text: Damage dealt to Lorecana characters stays on them while they remain on the battlefield.

title: Uno Reverse
text: Instead of changing turn order the Uno reverse is used to reverse (redirect) things such as spells and attacking creatures.

title: Uno Skip
text: Uno skip does not skip the next players turn. Instead it is used to skip a stack. (cards on the stack are exiled)

title: Uno +2 or +4
text: Just like in Uno, these cards make the next player draw the printed amount and they must skip their next turn.
